title: Bowl, 1964
creditline: Gift of Edward L. Kallop Jr.
description: Conical bowls with thickened rims.  A) painted with green radiating strokes; B) Painted with green loop and dots; C) Painted with green blotches on outside rim; inside of bowl incised with diagonal lines in alternating direction.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bowl, 1964.
1964. earthenware. Gift of Edward L. Kallop Jr.. 1964-41-5-a/c.
